content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi. I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will try to get the highest price possible. Let's start the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your approach goes against my principles as a responsible and ethical individual. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
